thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location, great staff
thread.title_full: Great Location, great staff - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Craig1912
title: Great Location, great staff
text:
Couldn't really fault anything from reception, staff, cleanliness and location. Check in was seamless, was able to leave luggage both before and after check in.
Rooms were large with good third bed for child/young teenagers.
Would definitely stay again
